long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Unification Web Wallet allows you to interact with Unification's Mainchain using your browser.

You can use Unification Web Wallet to:

- Create a new wallet
- Transfer FUND
- Stake FUND to validators
- Claim rewards from delegations
- View recent successful transactions
